title: Yiwu City Stay Steps from International Expo Centre
description: Steps from the Yiwu International Expo Centre building, Crowne Plaza Yiwu Expo, an IHG Hotel, is at the buzzing heart of exhibitions and trade in the Commodity City. From the bustling streets of Binwang Market to the colossal Yiwu International Trade City, this global trade city has a marvellous myriad of goods to peruse. When your appetite for acquisition has been satisfied, treat yourself to Cantonese cuisine at Ming Chinese Restaurant or a refined cocktail at the Illusions bar.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Yiwu Expo, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 57 ZongZe East Road, Yiwu 322000, China
